title: Dems’ Union ‘Wish List’ | Guests: Sen. Mike Lee & Helen Raleigh | 3/10/21
description:
Texas is now officially open, and progressives aren’t happy about it. The House passed the PRO Act, and it’s a wish list for union leaders. The banjo player for Mumford & Sons has apologized for endorsing Andy Ngo’s book. Is the word “normal” being canceled? Hillsdale College president Dr. Larry Arnn joins to debunk the lies about the 1776 Commission. Helen Raleigh, senior contributor to the Federalist, talks about Dr. Seuss’ cancellation and its similarities to growing up in China and the Chinese cultural revolution. Sen. Mike Lee joins to discuss new radical bills up for a vote. There’s a reported rise in hate crimes against Asian Americans, but is that really the case?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
